premise_source_doc_sentence: Communal violence in India includes acts of violence by followers of one religious group against followers and institutions of another religious group , often in the form of rioting .

A restraining order made against a religious leader may direct that he or she must obtain the permission of the Minister before addressing members of any religious group or institution , assisting or contributing to religious publications , or holding office in the editorial board or committee of such publications .
Religious identity , on the other hand , refers specifically to religious group membership regardless of religious activity or participation .
